name: 19_mintnft
description: 1. Requires python3, if you don't have it there are multiple resources online on how to install it according to your platform. 2. Set a virtual environment with `Python3 -m venv venv` 3. Initialize your virtual environment with `source venv/bin/activate` (For Mac and Linux). 4. Intall the dependencies with `pip install -r requirements.txt` 5. Play with it
